name: Volatility-Adjusted TRIX Keltner Crypto Trend
description: Daily-bar trend-following strategy for BTC and ETH that combines a volatility-scaled TRIX momentum oscillator with Keltner Channel confirmation. Trades long when the adjusted 15-period TRIX crosses above its 9-period signal and price closes above the upper KC band; trades short on the opposite conditions. Uses ATR-based fixed-fraction risk (2 % equity), a 1.2×ATR trailing stop, and a 3×ATR profit target to adapt to crypto volatility.
